channel.title: SCAR Mass Bitmap to String Convertor
channel.description:
[i]SCAR Mass Bitmap to String Convertor[/i]
Are you tired of having to manually encrypt all of those bitmaps you need in your SCARscripts? Well, those times are over, meet the Mass bitmap encryptor, it can encrypt as many bitmaps as you want and dump them all to a txt file!
I would like to thank kaitnieks for helping me finish the bitmaptostring algorithm.
Enjoy it! :)
[url=http://stuart.existhost.com/freddy/programs/EasyTracker.php?id=2]Download here![/url]
(This will also be included with the next version of srl) (Max image size 128*128 [265*256 tops])

item.title: SCAR Mass Bitmap to String Convertor
item.dc:creator: @joewnn joewnn
item.description:
@joewnn wrote:

Nice one. I always hated having to go through each bitmap one at a time when I used SCAR.

Read full topic
item.source: SCAR Mass Bitmap to String Convertor
